registration.register_request: &cPlease, register to the server with the command: /register <password> <password>

login.login_request: &cPlease, login to the server with the command: /login <password>

premium.success: Successfully set up! Step back and enjoy the premium log in!
premium.already_premium: You are already a premium player!

error_messages.name_length: &cYour username is either too short or too long!
error_messages.password_length: &cYour password is either too short or too long!
